title: GribStream
description:
GribStream offers high-speed access to both historical and real-time weather data. Leverage state of the art weather models like the National Blend of Models (NBM), Global Forecast System (GFS), High-Resolution Rapid Refresh (HRRR), GEFS, CFS and others.

- Blazing fast. Query thousands of coords, hundreds of weather parameters, years of data in a single http request, in seconds.
- Full forecast history, as-of/timetravel. Perfect for backtesting.
- Free tier unrestricted for commercial use
